scripts.build: echo '<++ app +++++++++++++>'; yarn workspace @modifier/app build ;echo '<++ server ++++++++++>'; yarn workspace @modifier/server build
scripts.format: echo '<++ app +++++++++++++>'; yarn workspace @modifier/app format ;echo '<++ server ++++++++++>'; yarn workspace @modifier/server format
scripts.lint: echo '<++ app +++++++++++++>'; yarn workspace @modifier/app lint ;echo '<++ server ++++++++++>'; yarn workspace @modifier/server lint
